original_text: I saved you from the power of the Egyptians and all those who were cruel to you. I chased away your enemies and I gave their land to you.
korean_text: 애굽 사람의 손과 너희를 학대하는 모든 자의 손에서 너희를 건져내고 그들을 너희 앞에서 쫓아내고 그 땅을 너희에게 주었으며

sentences.original_text: from the power of the Egyptians
and all those who were cruel to you

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희的大敵을 너희 앞에서 쫓아내고

sentences.original_text: and I gave their land to you
